page.title: 19INFLUENCE OF THE COTSWALDS
page.content: THE AREA COVERED IN THIS BLOCK IS A VERY RURAL ONE, WITH FEW FACILITIES OR AMENITIES, BUT THE MAJORITY OF THE POPULATION ENJOY THE QUIET LIVES THEY LEAD. A CAR IS OBVIOUSLY A NECESSITY FOR MANY OF THESE PEOPLE, AND LOCAL GARAGES PROVIDE GOOD SERVICE. THERE ARE MANY MORE ELDERLY PEOPLE THAN ANY OTHER AGE-GROUP, AND MOST HAVE LIVED IN THE AREA ALL THEIR LIVES, AND DO NOT WANT TO MOVE. THERE IS NO EVIDENCE OF NEW BUILDING ANYWHERE IN THE BLOCK, AND THERE IS LITTLE PROSPECT OF IT, IF A PROPOSAL TO EXTEND THE BOUNDARY OF THE {COTSWALDS AREA OF OUTSTANDING NATURAL {BEAUTY}TO INCLUDE MUCH OF THE LAND COVERED IN THIS SURVEY IS SUCCESSFUL.
